name: useSearchWithSuggestions
description: A comprehensive hook for building "Command Palette" or "Omnibar" style search interfaces. * It provides "Ghost Text" autocomplete (like Google search), command scoping (like Slack's `/` commands), and keyboard support. It handles the complex logic of parsing input strings to separate commands from queries.

props.name: data
props.description: The array of data objects to search through.

props.name: searchKeys
props.description: An array of keys (e.g., `['name', 'email']`) to search against by default.
